//   -------------------------------- ----- ----

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, 10, 4, -3, 0.5
    def c4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 15
    def c5, 0.5, 1.5, 0.0625, 0
    def c6, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0
    def c21, 0.001953125, 0.0078125, 0.064453125, 0
    def c22, 2, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.zw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_9AFB700E_0.txt
texldl r6, c220.z, s15
mov r5, c14 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r5.x, r6.x, c220.w, r5.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    mul r0, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r0, r0, s0
    add r0.w, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r1.x, -r0.w, c1.z
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    cmp r0.w, r1.x, c1.w, r0.w
    mov_pp r1.x, c0.x
    mad_pp r0.w, c2.x, r0.w, -r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r0_abs.w, c0.y
    pow_pp r2.x, r1.x, c0.z
    mov r1.x, c1.x
    cmp_pp r1.y, r0.w, c7.y, r1.x
    min_pp r3.x, r2.x, r1.y
    max_pp r1.y, c0.w, r3.x
    cmp_pp r1.z, -r0.w, c1.y, c1.x
    cmp_pp r0.w, r0.w, -c1.y, -c1.x
    add_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.z
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.y
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, c3.x
    max r1.yz, v1.xzww, c11.xxyw
    min r2.xy, c11.zwzw, r1.yzzw
    texld r2, r2, s5
    rcp r1.y, r2.w
    mul_sat r2, r1.y, r2.zzxy
    lrp_pp r3, r0.w, r2, r0.zzxy
    dp3_pp r0.x, r3.zwyw, c4
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c3.z
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.x, c8.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c16.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c8.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c3.y
    mad_pp r2, r2, r0.y, r3
    mov r0.zw, c13
    mad r0.yz, v0.xzww, -r0.xzww, r5.xxyw
    dp2add r0.y, r0.yzzw, r0.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c3.w
    mov r3.xy, c5
    mad r0.z, c12.w, -r3.x, r3.y
    texld_pp r3, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.w, r3.w, r3.w
    mul_pp r3, r3.zzxy, c17.zzxy
    mul r3, r0.x, r3
    lrp r1.y, r0.w, r0.z, c12.w
    lrp r4.x, r0.y, c1.x, r1.y
    mul r0.x, c15.x, c15.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c15.x
    lrp_pp r1.y, r0.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r2, r1.y
    mad_pp r0, r3, c3.y, r0
    mad_pp r1.yzw, r0.xzwy, c10.y, c10.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.y
    rcp r2.w, r1.z
    rcp r2.xy, r1.w
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r2.xyw, r0.xwzz, c6.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r2.x
    mad r2.x, r0.x, c5.z, r2.w
    mad r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, -r0.x
    add r2, r2.xyxy, c21.xyzy
    texld_pp r3, r2, s6
    texld_pp r2, r2.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r4, r0.x, r2, r3
    texld r0, v2.zwzw, s4
    dp4_sat r0.x, r0, c20
    add r0.yzw, -r1.x, c19.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww, c1.x
    mov r1.y, c3.y
    mad_pp r1.xy, v2.zwzw, r1.y, c18
    texld_pp r1, r1, s3
    mad r0.w, r1.x, c22.x, c22.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c9.w
    mad_sat_pp oC0.xyz, r4, r0, r0.w
    mov_pp oC0.w, r4.w

// approximately 82 instruction slots used (9 texture, 73 arithmetic)
